form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Military Selective Service Registration Form, Form I-687 ( (04/ 1987)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 34. To assist in establishing the required residence, please list all affiliations or associations with clubs, organizations, churches, unions, businesses, etc. From To Name of Organization Location (Month/Year) (Month/Year) CATHOLIC PARISH COMM. OF FAITH 1973 1642 S. New Hampshire Aye, LA,CA 1983 SANTA ISABEL CATHOLIC CHURCH 918 S. Soto St. LA,CA 10/70 Present 35. Absences from the United States since entry. (List most recent absence first and list absences back to January 1, 1982). From To Country Purpose of Trip (Month/Year) (Month/Year) None 36. Employment in the United States since first entry. (List present or most recent first and list back to date of entry; if none since entry, write "None".) Full Name and Address of Employer (with ZIP Code) Your Annual Wages From To (or Self employed and business address) Occupation Wages per Hour (Month/Year) (Month/Year) Retired None unimpliyad Present 37. I have registered under the Military Selective Service Act. My Selective Service No. is I am a male over the age of 17 and under the age of 26 required to register under the Military Selective Service Act and have not done so. I wish to register at this time. SSS Form 1 is attached. I am a male born after 1959 and over the age of 26 and cannot now register. I am exempt from Selective Service Registration either because I am a female or I was born before 1960. 38.1 have I have not assisted in the persecution of any person or persons on account of race, religion, nationality, membership in a particular social group or political opinion. 39.1 have I have not been treated for a mental disorder, drug addiction or alcoholism. 40. I have I have not been arrested, convicted or confined in a prison. 41.1 have have not been the beneficiary of a pardon, amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency or similar action. 42.1 have I have not received public assistance from any source, including, but not limited to, the United States Government, any state, county, city or municipality. (If you have, explain: including the name(s) and Social Security number(s) used.) Form I-687 (04/01/87) Page 3
